content: I hope there will be after story with other girls too like yuuna and valerie
What a lovely after story for kaori route. Hope you make after stories for the other routes!
I love it I hope they make a part 2

Be careful when buying games from this developer, they keep "improving" their games and making them not compatible with more and more devices, make sure you have a backup of the version of the app that works for your device if you have to uninstall for any reason
This app is very relaxing i love this app but this is so expensive tho

Oh wow I'm... after finishing ACE, I obviously started this one. All I can say is... this is such a good conclusion to ACE Academy. I actually cried at the end because of how good it was. It sort of breaks my heart to have to never be able to return to it. Either way, great job game devs! I can't wait to see more of your projects come to life!
Beautiful and Stunning voice acting. The art and story was very touching. I really enjoyed the ability to pick multiple choice options as I can chose to be more myself towards kaori.
Did i just pay for this to play & finish in 30 mins??? What now? Uninstall???
More stories please!! üôè

I love the story!! I hope there's an new update for this dating sim.. Storyline is to short maybe if you guys add more like summer and school days it will be so much fun i hope you guys saw this post üòã
I love the story
No ads or in app purchases
The story was really nice!

There's a big leap with improvements to this game compared to its prequel Ace Academy. Even though this game is a sequel of the Kaori route to ace academy, this game could also be a stand alone as the game does not require the player to be familiar with its predecessor. The only thing they would probably be confused of is GEARs which is basically a gundam since they were pilot students where they drive these mechas.
I paid for the app but it doesn't even start, freezes after hearing a second of the song, how can I get a refund?
I'm glad that i played this game

worth buying, and also i want more of this. even though i accept that theirs an ending but please extend the stories, because its short but it was extremely fun to play with. if the dev saw this please make the game more unique so that people can buy the game more often, i recommend this game to my friends tho. thank you and keep up the good work.
Great sorry Kaori was my romance pick in ace academy and great to have a after story to have a great ending hope they do this for other love interests or maybe continue the story
Plz make After Story of other girls as well.
The story really awesome
Omg, I loving the story so smooth and good
10/10üëå Please add more sequels of ace acedemy Especially on Valerie's route
Make more please!

What a nice touch to add an after story for Kaori from Ace Academy. This game adds depth in Kaori's character and really does reward you with the fan service. The naughtier options are usually well received which is lovely. Wish there were after stories with the other characters from Ace since I love them all too, but I'm not going to look the gift horse in the mouth and just appreciate this fun extra.
I want valerie

One of the best Visual Novels you can get on your phone, and a good side story to ACE Academy! Definitely worth the price, every penny.... Thank you, for another chapter in the story of ACE! I hope you guys will make the sequel to ACE Academy just as enjoyable as these two VNs.
Damn it, it ended so fast.
I would love to see the rest of the girls have their own as well even one with are best friend shou.

I'm more of a Mayu fan but this is a good story for fans of ACE Academy, and a good distraction for those that are expecting ACE 2. It has the same hiccups like any Pixel Fade game, VA that doesn't match the text (Kayori instead of Kaori), unnecessary characters bugging in the story (Gik Guk); but it has a fun and pretty emotional story that tugs at you.
Love the continuation of Robin Ostergard. Please let there be more in your next game.
Game is just as fun on mobile. Its nice to have this game on my phone so i can ay it wherever i go. It loads fairly fast and I've had no issues with crashes or stuttering with the game.
Its so heart warming i like it
If you played ACE academy this is a good continued story of what happens afterwards on kaori route
Beautiful game. Can't believe it end so soon

When i found out there was a sequel to ACE. I was like hell yes! Downloaded it right away. Great after story to ACE. The style to these visual novels are amazing. Artwork is superb and storyline draws you in wanting more. Only critical commentary i have is it was a bit short. This story was a great sequel to Kaoris timeline though. It would be abosolutely amazing if you guys could make a sequel to all the girls from ACE story like this one.

PixelFade's games remain consistently top notch. The writing has both heart and humor. The voice acting and Live 2D visuals are of good quality. Plus, there's a few easter eggs for fans.. Although a continuation of ACE Academy, the game stands on its own just fine. You don't need to have played the previous game to get a full experience from this one. Decent replayability, though not as much as their other games. Still, well worth the money, and a good intro to VNs if you're new to the genre.
I love it....I hope you do another sequel

A nice way to continue the story from the first game for those who wanted more. Even then I still wish for even more because of the incredible story that hooked me from the beginning. Unfortunately I have now played through all three Pixelfade games and must wait eagerly for their next project to release so I can enjoy another one of their amazing visual novels.

I don't know how to phrase it but this sequel was awesome. It added so much more to the story of an amazing game and the gameplay mechanics were even better this time around. Though, I feel that the other girls should also have their own stories. I would love to see how Mayu, Yuuna or Valerie end up with the mc.
An amazing visual novel with really funny and enjoyable moments Kaori is incredible cute but I would have loved an actual romance scene.

I can honestly say that every Pixelfade VN always surprises me with the amount of detail each story brings! At times it can have you wanting to cry with the MC and other times just laughing at the banter being thrown across each of the characters. It's like a rollercoaster, the VN takes you through the ups and downs of the MC (mostly up in this VN), and Pixelfade were able to portray that perfectly! But me being me I always hate it when things end so I just wished it could've been longer hahah
I really LOVE IT...IT WAS THE MOST AMAZING GAME I EVER LOVEEEE HEHE! MAN I WISH THIS WAS A ANIME SHOW !ü§≠‚ù§
great epilogue to ACE it was perfect and felt like I was really in the pc's place. my only complaint? you're pulling on my heart pixelfade!! üò≠
I love this game it made me understand love more.Please give us an update like they spending more time together.But love it thank you‚úåüèΩ
Amazing VN is so good i kinda feel like give Ace Academy a 4 star ranking just because i can't give this one a 6
I just dont get it. Try to install but just stuck at loading page for hours :(
Great, but a bit short

Why are you guys so damn good at creating VN's? I've only read 2 of them with ace academy being my first and kaori a.s it really piqued my interest even more. It really helps me escape reality and relieves me of stress given the fact I have no life and will never have an opportunity like this irl.

I just.... can't get to forget this short after story. Oh my god Pixelfade you are so killing my heart right now. Kaori is just as adorable as she is innocent. Disappointed a bit because of the wet dreams scene but meh, I don't really care to that. All I want is kiss and romance in a decent way. Thumbs up to all of you. Hopefully you ported your other games on mobile so it will be a portable romantic game.
good story I love it
Read every visual novels of Pixelfade and they are ALL worth it!!! Looking forward to Ethereal Enigma on mobile port.

The art style in this game have improve DRASTICALLY. The shading, expression and character design is amazing.Would incredibly recommend those who wants to improve their narrating skill and for those who enjoys romance genre visual novel.

Hi, I'm a big fan of Ace. The Ace academy was the breath taking game. I love it very much so I bouht Kaori A.S. but there is one thing that bother me a lot is that you guys don't have the option to mute the characters dialogue anymore. I prefer to just read all of it by myself.. so would you mind add the option back in ¬∞ ^ ¬∞ thank you for reading this comment of mine ^^

it was a honest to god great game(is it a game? IDK) and honestly ACE academy and this together is one of the best things I've ever wached/played good work devs BUT FOR THE LOVE OF GOD MAKE ONE FOR YUNNA AND MABY AN ACE 2 called ACE UNIVERSITY OR SOMTHING!!?!??!?!! PLZZZ

Cheesey as all hell,predictable as well ,BUT BLOODY HELL I LOVED IT.Clocked Ace Academy a few times and finding this the other day in the games on sale part of google ( didn't even know it existed till then )was a great bonus. I suggest playing Ace Academy first and following Kaoris route to REALLY appreciate this. Well done devs,NO DO ONE FOR VALERIE !
great vn i liked that we were able to continue to grow with our favoites from ace acadamey...make a sequel were all waiting
i really love it. I hope they mske more games
Amazing game
really good

Ive read 2 of your guys 3 visual novels and i loved them both beyond words. I'm so glad Kaori is still so fiery and loud like she was in ACE i love it. I also love that she has a secret soft side. A super soft side. For the MC the daycare kids and her family. Its something i never expected her to have. She may be my new favorite character after playing this. I cant say for sure until you guys make these after stories for the other girls in ACE. Please do that. I think more than just me want it
The opening always freeze when I open the game. Can you guys look into it? Thank you for the great visual novels you guys made. I'm planning to buy Crystalline soon.
Big F for the MC.
Nothing else to say,just amazing
Expected nothing less from pixelfade they know how to give the fans what they want I love kaori as a character and she was my main ro in ace academy
If you played Ace academy you already know what youre getting into. You pervert! If you havent then you shall soon praise the booty in all its glory
